name: Concession Revolution Tycoon
description:
A Kenney GameJam 2021 Game

Description

The local movie theater thought that it was a great idea to place their employees on a turntable in order to increase sales and now it is time for you as a manager to get to work and make some money! Concession Revolution Tycoon is a management simulator that puts a couple of twists on the genre.

How to Play

Management Phase

  • Hiring an Employee: Drag and Drop an employee from the right onto a blue circle on the left
  • Firing an Employee: Drag and Drop an employee from the left onto the red circle on the right
  • Working an Employee: Drag and Drop an employee from the left onto one of the white circles in the middle

Day Phase (Lasts 1 Minute and 20 Seconds)

  • Use the buttons on the left and right to Rotate each worker to serve a customer
  • If an Employee's Sanity Falls beneath 0 they will quit
  • Leftover customers at the end of the day reduce some of your hard earned cash
Tips

Numbers go up and down.

There might be secrets between employees

We hope you enjoy playing the game!

~McAllister Games
